metadata.title: CVE-2021-20320 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in s390 eBPF JIT in bpf_jit_insn inarch/s390/net/bpf_jit_comp.c in the Linux kernel. In this flaw, a localattacker with special user privilege can circumvent the verifier and maylead to a confidentiality problem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
